arts.ttl: David Gray won't make Hibs 'excuses' as he warns stars they brought Kilmarnock collapse on themselves
arts.sum: The Leith outfit were cruising inside half an hour thanks to Rocky Bushiri and Elie Youan before being pegged back to share the points

arts.ttl: Hibernian vs Kilmarnock predictions: Sun will not shine on Killie in Leith
arts.sum: Hibernian will be looking to make it two wins from two in the Scottish Premiership when they host Kilmarnock at Easter Road on Sunday and Alex Jack expects them to do so with ease.

arts.ttl: Rangers vs Dundee predictions: Gers to sink the Dark Blues
arts.sum: James Mason is expecting a routine victory for Rangers when they welcome Dundee to Ibrox for Scottish Premiership action on Saturday.
